name: Air Cargo CO2 Track And Trace
description: Track your Air Cargo shipments and measure CO2 with more than 190 airlines

api_methods.name: PULL (track)
api_methods.description:
By providing a valid AWB, you can get tracking information for the shipment.

Answers are 10s in average. However, it takes between 1s to 5min to get the information from the airline system but the API has to answer in 30s which generating timeouts errors.
In such case, you have to build the logic to try again 10mins after a timeout to avoid this or to use the subscription method.

utterances.utterance: Can you track the shipment with AWB number 123-45678901?
I need the tracking details for my cargo with AWB 987-65432109.
Please provide the status of the shipment with AWB 555-12345678.
What's the current location of the package with AWB 321-98765432?
Can you give me the CO2 tracking information for AWB 654-32109876?
I want to check the delivery status for AWB 111-22233344.
Track the air cargo shipment with AWB 777-88899900 for me.
Could you find out where my shipment with AWB 444-55566677 is?
I need to know the status of the cargo with AWB 222-33344455.
Please track the package with AWB 888-77766655.

api_methods.name: PUSH (unsubscribe)
api_methods.description: Provided valid callback URL and AWB to unsubscribe from receiving tracking updates.

utterances.utterance: I want to stop receiving updates for my air cargo shipment.
Please unsubscribe me from tracking notifications for my package.
Can you remove me from the tracking updates list for my shipment?
I no longer wish to get tracking updates for my air cargo.
Stop sending me tracking information for my air cargo delivery.
I would like to unsubscribe from the tracking alerts for my shipment.
Please cancel my subscription to the tracking updates for my cargo.
I want to opt out of receiving tracking notifications for my air cargo.
Can you unsubscribe me from the air cargo tracking updates?
I wish to stop getting tracking updates for my air cargo package.

api_methods.name: PUSH (subscribe)
api_methods.description: Provided valid callback URL, AWB and/or email(s), you can receive tracking event updates automatically when they're available.

utterances.utterance: Can you keep me updated on my air cargo shipments automatically?
I want to receive automatic updates for my air cargo tracking.
Is it possible to get notifications for my air cargo shipments?
Please subscribe me to automatic tracking updates for my air cargo.
How can I get real-time updates on my air cargo shipments?
I need to track my air cargo shipments with automatic notifications.
Can you set up automatic tracking alerts for my air cargo?
I want to be notified automatically about my air cargo tracking events.
Please enable automatic updates for my air cargo shipment tracking.
How do I subscribe to automatic air cargo tracking updates?

api_methods.name: PUSH (unsubscribe)
api_methods.description: Provided valid callback URL and AWB to unsubscribe from receiving tracking updates.

api_methods.name: PUSH (subscribe)
api_methods.description: Provided valid callback URL, AWB and/or email(s), you can receive tracking event updates automatically when they're available.

utterances.utterance: Can you keep me updated on my air cargo shipment status?
I want to track my air cargo deliveries automatically.
Please notify me about any updates on my air cargo shipments.
How can I receive automatic updates for my air cargo tracking?
Set up automatic notifications for my air cargo shipment status.
I need to subscribe to updates for my air cargo tracking.
Can you push updates to me about my air cargo shipments?
I want to be automatically informed about my air cargo delivery status.
Please enable automatic tracking updates for my air cargo.
How do I get real-time updates on my air cargo shipments?
